title: Sinners of Water & Fire
description: Their love was legendary, cursed, and forbidden. The fates conspired to keep them apart, but destiny will bring them together again…When one of their own becomes the target of a demon bent on revenge, the Society will do anything to keep her safe, including stealing a God from the Heavens.Heru, son of Geb, once sold his soul to forget her, and now he’ll give anything to keep her safe. Gods and Demons collide in the final installment of Charity Parkerson’s award-winning “Sinners” series.
author: Charity Parkerson
